lead_paragraph: Trial lawyers with experience in sexual abuse cases say the monetary damages could be extensive, and Penn State officials, including former coach Joe Paterno, could be sued.
snippet: Trial lawyers with experience in sexual abuse cases say the monetary damages could be extensive, and Penn State officials, including former coach Joe Paterno, could be sued.
